form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR ISSUANCE OR EXTENSION OF PERMIT TO REENTER THE UNITED STATES, FORM 1-31 ( (Rev. 4-1-76IN)

full_text: Screened by NARA 7/28/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Form approved. Immigration and Naturalization Service OMB No 43-R0052. APPLICATION FOR ISSUANCE OR EXTENSION FEE STAMP OF PERMIT TO REENTER THE UNITED STATES 20 SEP 1979 as provided in section 223 of the Los 282957 Immigration and Nationality Act Use typewriter or print in block letters with ball -point pen. Jele 100(724) 547-003 issuance I hereby apply for (check one) of Permit to Reenter the United States extension FAMILY NAME (Capital Letters) FIRST MIDDLE 1. YOUR NAME IMPORTANT: You must submit your Alien Registration Receipt NGO, Khanh Hoa Card with this application if you checked Issuance'' above. C/O IN CARE OF If you checked "Extension" you must submit the reentry per- (No and Street) (Apt. No.) mit you wish to have extended. MAILING 316 South Alhambra Avenue ALIEN REGISTRATION NUMBER ADDRESS (State) Code) IN U.S. Monterey Park, California 91754 A- 20 543 620 FILL IN ITEMS 2 THROUGH 6 ONLY IF APPLICATION IS FOR ISSUANCE OF REENTRY PERMIT 2. DATE OF BIRTH(Month, Day. Year) COUNTRY OF BIRTH COUNTRY OF CLAIMED NATIONALITY COLOR OF EYES COLOR OF HAIR January 10, 1915 Vietnam China Brown Black HEIGHT FEET INCHES VISIBLE MARKS AND SCARS NONE Visible 3. I DID DID NOT REGISTER FOR SELECTIVE SERVICE 4. FILL IN THE ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK AS TO first ARRIVAL IN UNITED STATES FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE OR ADJUSTMENT TO PERMANEN RESIDENT STATUS NAME UNDER WHICH ADMITTED OR ADJUSTED PORT OF ARRIVAL OR LOC ATION OF DATE OF ARRIVAL OR DATE AS OF IMMIGRATION OFFICE WHICH WHICH ADJUSTMENT OF STATUS NGO, Khanh Hoa GRANTED ADJUSTMENT WAS GRANTED Los Angeles, California June 3, 1975 FILL IN REMAINING ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK ON DD NOT ACQUIREPERMANENT RESIDENCE THROUGH ADJUSTMENT. MANNER OF FIRST ARRIVAL IN UNITED STATES FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE Name of Vessel, Airline, etc.) 7451 N6 Adjustment of Status 2 BLEARED NOV 1979 9/20/79 blend FATHER'S NAME AT TIME OF YOUR ARRIVAL NAME INITIALS Not Applicable Not Applicable 5. FILL IN THE ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK AS TO last ARRIVAL IN U.S. (Exclude an re-entry after an absence of less than six months in Canada or Mexico.) NAME UNDER WHICH ADMITTED PORTOF ABRIVAL DATE OF ARRIVAL NGO Khanh Hoa IN$TIAngeles,California 1976 NAME OF VESSEL, AIRLINE OR OTHER MEANS OF CONVEYANCE: 6. PORT OF proposed DEPARTURE FROM UNITED STATES DATE OF proposed DEPARTURE LENGTH OF INTENDED ABSENCE ABROAD Los Angeles, California September 25, 1979 3 months NAME OF TRANSPORTATION COMPANY IF DEPARTURE IS TO BE BY VESSEL, GIVE NAME OF VESSEL China Airlines FILL IN ITEM 7, ONLY IF APPLICATION IS FOR EXTENSION OF REENTRY PERMIT 7. List all countries visited since your last departure from the United States, in the order visited DATE & PORT OF LAST DEPARTURE FROM U.S. Not Applicable 8. FILL IN ITEM 8 ONLY IF YOU HAVE PREVIOUSLY OBTAINED A PERMIT TO REENTER ISSUANCE DATE OF LAST PERMIT LOCATION OF IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION OFFICE ISSUING LAST PERMIT MY LAST PERMIT (City and State) IS ATTACHED August 16, 1976 Los Angeles, California IS NOT ATTACHED IF THE PERMIT IS NOT ATTACHED, STATE REASON: IF PERMIT IS ATTACHED. STATE EXPIRATION DATE August 15,1977 ALL APPLICANTS MUST FILL IN ITEMS 9 THROUGH 20, INCLUSIVE 9. PRESENT OCCUPATION: NONE NAME and ADDRESS OF EMPLOYER SOCIAL SECURITY ACCOUNT NUMBER NONE 548-37-3368 10. MAILING ADDRESS ABROA D (Number and Street) (City/Town) (State/Province/District) (Country) C/O Wong ShingKwong 231 Winglock Street, 3/F W. Hong Kong 11. COUNTRIES TO BE VISITED (List each country) Taiwan and Hong Kong and Thailand Singapore 12.
